description:
Duck, Quack, Shoot! Is a fun party game styled like an old-fashioned mechanical carnival shooting gallery. Can you beat the ducks? 

•	Single and local multiplayer game modes
•	4 unique background themes -fairground, casino, farm and outer space
•	Classic mechanical shooting gallery 
•	Fun and fast paced with a variety of traditional and special targets!
name: Duck, Quack, Shoot!
